title: Citi International Personal Bank EMEA Launches Swiss Booking Centre In Geneva
summary: Dubai - Citi International Personal Bank (IPB) EMEA today announced the launch of its Switzerland Booking Centre in Geneva, giving Citigold Private Clients based in the UAE access to the world's biggest and most exclusive investment center.
tag-1: Citi International Personal Bank EMEA Launches Swiss Booking Centre In Geneva
tag-3: Dubai – Citi International Personal Bank (IPB) EMEA today announced the launch of its Switzerland Booking Centre in Geneva, giving Citigold Private Clients based in the UAE access to the world's biggest and most exclusive investment center.
tag-4: Citi IPB EMEA provides a diversified and comprehensive international wealth management proposition through its booking centers in Dubai, London, Jersey and now Switzerland for clients who are looking to benefit from international investment opportunities to diversify their portfolios.
tag-5: The IPB EMEA Switzerland Booking Centre is aimed at those, who can invest at least US$1 million with the bank and satisfy the Swiss Qualified Investor status of net worth of US$5 million minimum. Clients will benefit from the best and most exclusive international wealth management opportunities and a level of service usually associated with a Private Bank. Moreover, clients will have access to an IPB Relationship Manager based in Switzerland or in one of its many service centers throughout the region.
tag-6: "With the launch of our Switzerland Booking Centre, we will now be able to provide a unique experience to clients who would not normally have access to the level of service we provide without meeting the higher net worth criteria demanded by many private banks outside Citi. While their accounts will be in one of the leading financial centers in Europe, they will be able to take advantage of diversification into multiple jurisdictions and high quality advice provided by trained and certified Relationship Managers from around the region," said Vipul Kapur, Consumer Business Manager, UK Consumer & IPB EMEA. "IPB continues to grow at an excellent pace, and with this development we now provide more reasons for clients to bank with us."
tag-7: Aqil Jaffer Ali, Retail Banking Head, Citibank UAE, said: "Citi is highly committed to its retail franchise in the UAE, and continues to invest in the business and to innovate with world-class products and services for its clients. This move falls within our strategy for growth, which is focused on three key pillars – global reach, empowering our customers through digitization and focus on key cities across the globe, including Dubai and Abu Dhabi."
tag-8: Citi has had presence in the UAE for the past 50 years, and is expanding its major operations within the country. Citibank, the consumer banking arm of Citi, is currently a major player in the UAE's credit card market and a leading provider of Wealth Management and Consumer Credit services.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
